metadata.title: CVE-2018-16809 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Dolibarr through 7.0.0. expensereport/card.phpin the expense reports module allows SQL injection via the integerparameters qty and value_unit.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
